name: Gloria Zhao
cooked: Now that a release candidate 3 is available, I have edited the original post to point to v29.0rc3. If you are interested in previous release candidate(s), you can still find them in the 29.0 bins directory Index of /bin/bitcoin-core-29.0/ and tagged on github.
topic_title: Bitcoin Core 29.0 release candidate is available
topic_html_title: Bitcoin Core 29.0 release candidate is available
raw: Now that a release candidate 3 is available, I have edited the original post to point to v29.0rc3. If you are interested in previous release candidate(s), you can still find them in the 29.0 bins directory https://bitcoincore.org/bin/bitcoin-core-29.0 and tagged on github.
